state.description: The current state of the team membership (active, pending, etc.).

role.description: The role or position of the user within the team.

url.description: The URL link to access more details about the team membership.

organization.description: The name of the organization the team membership belongs to.

team_slug.description: The unique identifier (slug) of the team the user belongs to.

username.description: The username of the user associated with the team membership.
